source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a full shot from a high-angle perspective, looking down a pole vaulting pole at a woman positioned directly below in the center foreground. A large red and white landing mat occupies the middle ground, with a red running track and green field visible in the background. This movement transitions the framing to a medium shot, revealing her face and torso as she remains in the center foreground.
